WindowsButton.java: memento: WindowsButton acts as a memento, which ons Click, which ons Click. WindowsButton acts as a caretaker for memento Button, which renders, which ons Click. It is a public class that implements Button. The 2 methods of WindowsButton are render (void) and onClick (void). No methods call render and render calls 11 methods : setOpaque method of class JComponent, setBackground method of class JComponent, setVisible method of class Window, onClick method of class WindowsButton, setDefaultCloseOperation method of class JFrame, setHorizontalAlignment method of class JLabel, add method of class Container, getContentPane method of class JFrame, setFont method of class JComponent, setLayout method of class Container and setSize method of class Window. Only one method ( render method of class WindowsButton ) calls onClick and onClick calls 3 methods : addActionListener method of class AbstractButton, setVisible method of class Window and exit method of class System.

Demo.java: Demo does not have any design pattern.  It is a public class. The 3 methods of Demo are main (void), configure (void) and runBusinessLogic (void). No methods call main and main calls 2 methods : runBusinessLogic method of class Demo and configure method of class Demo. Only one method ( main method of class Demo ) calls configure and configure calls 2 methods : getProperty method of class System and equals method of class String. Only one method ( main method of class Demo ) calls runBusinessLogic and runBusinessLogic calls only one method : renderWindow method of class dialog.
